title: Katherine Musallam Environmental science-Erosion and ranching practices   Feb. 18-22

tasks.task: Explain soil degradation and conservation methods for a video transcript overview
subtasks: Discuss human and natural factors causing erosion
Explain the role of crops and trees in soil protection
List and describe farmer practices to reduce erosion (intercropping, crop rotation, shelter belts, conservation, terracing, contour farming)
Explain ranching practices and their impact on soil (overgrazing, soil compaction, exposed top soil, invasive species)
Mention the creation of posters and connection to real-life situations
